message: Bob, I'm offering you my product at a price of $1700000. This is a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive price.  I'm confident this will be a mutually beneficial deal.  Let me know your thoughts.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. Would you be open to discussing a lower price? I am willing to consider offers up to $1500000.
